name: Callisto
long_description: Callisto is a nonprofit tech startup that detects serial sexual offenders and connects survivors with support. Callisto's online system launched in 2015, and is currently available on over 40 college campuses. In 2020, we launched a new offering that combines our unique matching escrow with legal services, ensuring that eventually every survivor in the country will be able to safely coordinate action and share information with other victims of the same perpetrator.
one_liner: We create tech to combat sexual assault, support survivors, andâ€¦
